articles.content: High blood pressure, also referred to as hypertension, is a common medical condition. In North America, as many as 1 in 3 individuals are silently living with this disorder. Genetics, being overweigh… [+6393 chars]

articles.author: TN Digital
articles.title: Ovarian cancer: Top 3 silent signs that often go overlooked, tips to reduce risk - Times Now
articles.description: Despite being a major threat to female health, the symptoms of ovarian cancer often go overlooked which leads to an unhealthy prognosis of the same.
